title: Cantaloupe Basil Salsa
directions: Toss together all ingredients in a bowl and let stand, covered and chilled, 10 minutes.
ingredients: 2 cups diced (1/4 inch) cantaloupe (from a 2 1/4-lb piece)
1/4 cup finely chopped sweet onion such as Vidalia
1 (2-inch-long) fresh hot red or green chile such as serrano or Thai, minced (including some seeds)
